# The `WebAssemblyRefTypeMem2Local.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Assign reference type allocas to local addrspace (addrspace(1)) so that their loads and stores can be lowered to local.gets/local.sets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Assign reference type allocas to local addrspace (addrspace(1)) so that their loads and stores can be lowered to local.gets/local.sets.

<SectionDefinition>
